description.value:
A set of panpipes to evoke awe, wonder, or fear in your audience.

If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

Spellcasting Focus. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus, using it in place of any material component which does not list a cost.
